definition: to walk on tiptoe/to step on sb's foot/to join (a trade, profession etc)/to associate with (a certain group of people)
to walk on tiptoe/to walk quietly/to tread (on)/to follow

sentences.english: Elephants walk on tiptoe, they can walk in the mud easily.
sentences.chinese: 他們躡足而行，可以在泥淖中自如行走。

sentences.english: Fagin stealthily descended the kitchen stairs .
sentences.chinese: 費根躡手躡足了廚房的樓梯。

sentences.english: I woke up in the middle of the night and heard someone prowling around my yard.
sentences.chinese: 我半夜醒來，聽見有人在我的庭院裏躡足走動。

sentences.english: Fagin stealthily descended the kitchen stairs.
sentences.chinese: 費根躡手躡足了廚房的樓梯。
